full_prompt:
You are a software engineer. Your task is to update the GraphQL schema based on the following requirements.
 
  **Schema Requirements:**
  - Modify or extend the GraphQL types, inputs, or enums listed below.
  - Ensure all changes are backward-compatible. Do not delete or rename fields unless explicitly approved.
  - Add new fields with accurate types and optional flags where appropriate.
  - Follow naming conventions and keep schema files cleanly formatted.
 
- Your task is to update GraphQL Schema for new feature ______. **Schema Updates:** - The GraphQL type ShippingStrategies should now includes a new field called sla of type SLA. - The mutation updateShippingStrategy should include a new optional input field sla of type SLAInput. **Task Requirements:** - Update the schema to with the correct fields. - Update the ShippingStrategies Type to accept the sla input field. - Use this exact format:

## Memory Context (from syntheticMemory/)

Feature: PFS Feature
	• Connected features: graphql_schema, shipping
	• Related nodes:
		• update-shipping-strategy.graphql (standalone)
		• shipping-strategies.graphql (standalone)
	• Prior runs:
		• CEPG-2121 (unknown, no score) touched ce-cartxo/src/type-defs/gql/common/contract/fulfillment/update-shipping-strategy.graphql, ce-cartxo/src/type-defs/gql/common/contract/fulfillment/fulfillment-group/shipping-strategies.graphql
	• Complexity: 0.65

## Read-before-edit (local file guidance)
	1. Open 1.0 and review and update according to ticket requirements while maintaining existing patterns.
	2. Open ce-cartxo/src/type-defs/gql/common/contract/fulfillment/update-shipping-strategy.graphq and review and update according to ticket requirements while maintaining existing patterns.
	3. Open ce-cartxo/src/type-defs/gql/common/contract/fulfillment/fulfillment-group/shipping-strategies.graphq and review and update according to ticket requirements while maintaining existing patterns.
